blog.title: AJ's Blog
blog.author: Adrian Jones Abache
blog.description: Welcome to my blog! Here, I share my thoughts and experiences.

posts.title: Day 1
posts.content: On June 16, 2023, I embarked on my first day of On-the-Job Training (OJT) at Bicol University, where I had the privilege of being interviewed and oriented by Dr. Rommel Evan Paje, an esteemed professional in the field. As I entered the office, I felt a mix of excitement and anticipation, eager to immerse myself in the working environment and apply my knowledge and skills gained through my studies.
